body.head: With Barbara Guest in Paris
body.octave:
Oh Barbara! do you think they’ll ever name anything after us like rue Henri-Barbusse or canard a l’ouragan?
have infected a pale white moonish bateau-frigidaire with our melancholy lights and vaguely proud dissemblings?
body.sestet: care for the lap of Mallarmé and the place where heroes fell down is right in our Pushkinesque enclosure as greatness sleeps outside smiles and bears the purple city air
